title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken: Kanwa - Luminous Memories

synonyms: That Time I got Reincarnated as a Slime Episode 65.5
Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken Recap
alternative_titles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Season 3: Digression - Luminous Memories
alternative_titles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件 閑話:ルミナスメモリーズ

synopsis:
Recap of Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken 3rd Season.

Rimuru and Hinata, despite both holding similar values, fought fiercely. What happened behind the scenes of this complicated situation? From the perspective of Luminous Valentine, the one and only God of the Holy Empire of Lubelius and one of the Octagram Demon Lords. The details of the "Holy Demon Battle" are told, as well as some secret that she has never told anyone.
